reporting-org.narrative: The Global Fund to Fight AIDS, Tuberculosis and Malaria

title.narrative: Nicaragua, all united holding the achievements and consolidating the actions aimed at pre-elimination and elimination of Malaria

description.narrative: Nicaragua - Malaria - Federación Red NICASALUD - NICASALUD. This program has the following goals: Reduce malaria cases by 90 percent by 2021.. Reduce the number of active foci by 84 percent by 2021.. Reduce the rate of positive malaria tests to 0.39 per 100 samples.. The objectives of this program are: Ensure universal access to prevention, diagnosis and treatment to eliminate malaria in Nicaragua.. Increase awareness of the epidemiological, parasitological and entomological surveillance system to reduce and eliminate the transmission foci and avoid the reintroduction of malaria at the local level.. Strengthen efforts toward becoming a country free from malaria transmission at the local level through innovation, research and certification.. Promote citizen engagement and strengthen comprehensive, cross-sector, interagency and cross-border activities, ensuring a setting that is conducive to eliminating malaria.

title.narrative: NIC-M-REDNICA Program Agreement 4

Coverage / Output indicator for NIC-M-REDNICA
Proportion of suspected malaria cases that receive a parasitological test at private sector sites
Proportion of confirmed malaria cases that received first-line antimalarial treatment in the community
Proportion of confirmed malaria cases that received first-line antimalarial treatment at public sector health facilities
Percentage of confirmed cases fully investigated and classified
Proportion of suspected malaria cases that receive a parasitological test in the community
Number of long-lasting insecticidal nets distributed to at-risk populations through mass campaigns
Proportion of households in targeted areas that received Indoor Residual Spraying during the reporting period
CM Other-2 : Percentage of cases reported within 48 hours of detection
Proportion of suspected malaria cases that receive a parasitological test at public sector health facilities
Percentage of malaria foci fully investigated and classified
Impact indicator for NIC-M-REDNICA
Inpatient malaria deaths per year: rate per 100,000 persons per year
Reported malaria cases (presumed and confirmed)
Annual parasite incidence: Confirmed malaria cases (microscopy or RDT): rate per 1000 persons per year (Elimination settings)
Number of active foci of malaria
Outcome indicator for NIC-M-REDNICA
Annual blood examination rate: per 100 population per year (Elimination settings)
Proportion of population with access to an ITN within their household
Percentage of existing ITNs used the previous night
